messages.messageBody:
http://books.bitway.ne.jp/shop/mt-detail_B/trid-pda/ccid-0401/cont_id-B0950006001.html#mokuji

A book called "Shinsengumi no Onnatachi" ("Women of the Shinsengumi") by
Domon Fuyuuji. I'm gonna try and get ahold of it. Looks interesting...

--Masayoshi
